Service Details: - Promotes social and emotional competence, resiliency, and school success in children during their early elementary school years - Based on the children's book, 'The Adventures of Taxi Dog', this video series is filled with humorous stories about Maxi the Taxi Dog and taxi driver, Jim - Introduces children to the essential skills of social emotional learning (SEL) through Maxi and Jim's interactions with the many characters they encounter on their taxi journeys in The Big City
Eligibility: For students ages kindergarten to grade three
Major Intersection: Commercial Dr and Rutland Rd N
